=== Current Projects ===

* Ubuntu Sri Lankan Team is ready to distribute free Ubuntu (Ubuntu with the GNOME desktop environment), Edubuntu (Ubuntu for education), Kubuntu (Ubuntu with the K Desktop environment), Lubuntu (Ubuntu that uses LXDE), Mythbuntu (Designed for creating a home theater PC with MythTV), Ubuntu Studio (Designed for multimedia editing and creation), Xubuntu (Ubuntu with the XFCE desktop environment) 14.04 LTS "Trusty Tahr" release. Please contact any of above for more information.

* Please consider contributing to the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/dapper/+lang/si|Dapper to Sinhala]]</nowiki> translation effort. We're using the <nowiki>[[http://sinhala.sourceforge.net/|Sinhala Unicode Font]]</nowiki> for this purpose.

=== Past Events ===

* '''Urban Gaming Challenge'''
The Student Club of APIIT have decided to hold a Urban Gaming Challenge - 2007 (UGC - 2007) on the 20th & 21th of October 2007.

* '''The Information & Technology Day of Prince of Wales' College, Moratuwa.'''
The IT Day of Prince of Wales' College was held on Friday, 15th June 2007, from 02.00pm onwards at the college main hall. For this day The I.T.P.W.C has organized a Quiz Competition & they promote Ubuntu 7.04 / Edubuntu 7.04 / Kubuntu 7.04 for the invitees.

* '''Dapper Release Party ''' 
The Sri Lankan <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SriLankanTeam/DapperReleaseParty|release party]]</nowiki> for Ubuntu 6.06 LTS (Dapper Drake) was held on Sunday, 4th June 2006, from 1pm onwards at Excel World. The event was a huge success, with more Dappers CDs being passed around than any of us could count. :) The <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SriLankanTeam/DapperReleaseParty|party page]]</nowiki> has more information, including links to web blog posts and pictures.

=== Getting Ubuntu ===
If your net connection is too slow and you can't wait for them to ship, find a person who will burn you a CD/DVD (look in the members list above for someone who is a "CD/DVD Contact") and contact them by e-mail.

=== Getting Support ===
You can find us on <nowiki>[[https://groups.google.com/d/forum/ubuntu-sri-lankan-team|Web Forum]]</nowiki>. Also feel free to join us on our <nowiki>[[https://groups.google.com/d/forum/ubuntu-sri-lankan-team|mailing list]]</nowiki> at ''ubuntu-sri-lankan-team@googlegroups.com''.
